snippet: BOOKER--Stephen, of Plattsburgh, NY died March 23, 2016. He was a Visual Artist who exhibited in the Washington Square Outdoor Art Exhibit for more than 40 years, but his paintings were collected by patrons worldwide. Donations may be made to the Schomburg Center or the Studio Museum in Harlem. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BOOKER--Stephen, of Plattsburgh, NY died March 23, 2016. He was a Visual Artist who exhibited in the Washington Square Outdoor Art Exhibit for more than 40 years, but his paintings were collected by patrons worldwide. Donations may be made to the Schomburg Center or the Studio Museum in Harlem. 1/3
